channel.title: Slayer Tips
channel.description: Can anyone provide some slayer tips for me? I just finished Smoking Kills and want to get my Slayer Helmet.

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Whichever slayer master you do decide to use make sure you use a ring of wealth too You never know what you could get.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

IT took me a little while of time, got to like lvl 70 slayer from like 62 doing it, and got 3-4 mill

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:7, topic:424741”][quote author=Travas link=topic=527403.msg3844780#msg3844780 date=1323543375]
Mazchna/Achtryn: 316 tasks.
Vannaka: 70 tasks.
Chaeldar: 32 tasks.
Sumona: 30 tasks.
Duradel/Lapalok: 23 tasks.
Kuradal: 20 tasks.

A proven way to decrease the time it takes to getting 400 points is by doing 9 low-level tasks, and on the 10th completing a harder slayer masters task.

http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Slayer_reward_points#Assignments
[/quote]
Okay, I plan on doing Sumona, to get the most exp. Would there be an easier way? Say do Vannaka for like the 9 tasks, like you said, and then using Sumona for the 10th?[/quote]Don’t use Vannaka at all, it’s only 4 points per task, 10 per 10 tasks, and 60 per 50 tasks. If your looking for easiness use [font=helvetica][size=13px]Chaeldar[/size][/font], and switch to Sumona every 10 and 50 tasks

UNLESS your able to use Duradel, if you are, use him for ever 10 and 50 tasks, and sumona for all the rest

JgjQc.jpg651×753

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:6, topic:424741”]Mazchna/Achtryn: 316 tasks.
Vannaka: 70 tasks.
Chaeldar: 32 tasks.
Sumona: 30 tasks.
Duradel/Lapalok: 23 tasks.
Kuradal: 20 tasks.

A proven way to decrease the time it takes to getting 400 points is by doing 9 low-level tasks, and on the 10th completing a harder slayer masters task.

RuneScape Wiki

Slayer reward point

Slayer reward points are a currency obtained by completing Slayer assignments or a special challenge from any Slayer Master bar Turael and Spria, or by trading in completed Tuska masks. The number rewarded depends on the Slayer Master, with the...


Okay, I plan on doing Sumona, to get the most exp. Would there be an easier way? Say do Vannaka for like the 9 tasks, like you said, and then using Sumona for the 10th?

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Do the demon slayer master for 9 tasks in a row, then on the 10th task do the highest one you can for the extra bonus points.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Depending on your current slayer level. Each slayer master will give a different amount of points with Kuradel at 75 slayer being the highest at 18 points each task, 90 each 10 tasks and 270 each 50.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

How long do you think it would take me to get 400 points?

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer Tips
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

Do every task, and make them as fast as possible. Use turmoil or piety with high strength bonus or prayer bonus. Use a cannon on any task you can to speed up kills.

Read full topic
